title: Box, 18th–19th century
provenance: Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw; 2006: acquired by Museum
creditline: Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw
description: Short, cylindrical form with hinged, slightly domed circular lid; polychrome decoration on white ground, lid with scene of blue-robed maiden flanked by two putti; sides decorated with ochre and green flower garlands.

tombstone.epitaph: Box, 18th–19th century.Tin-glazed earthenware, metal. Gift of Eugene V. and Clare E. Thaw. 2006-27-10.
